item.description: How do you create suspense? I’m asked that question often, and it seems that every writers’ symposium has a class with that title.

item.title: Craftsmanship – The Alternative to the Four Hour Work Week Mindset
item.description: http://dantawfik.com/craftsmanship-the-alternative-to-the-four-hour-work-week-mindset-1 What is missed in all of this is the mindset of craftsmanship; that one’s expertise and deliberate focus on one’s craft is actually the primary driver for success and not some crapshoot of a series of hacks.
